      • createProyect

        public boolean createProyect(java.lang.String proyectName,
                             java.lang.String clientName,
                             int startDay,
                             int startMonth,
                             int startYear,
                             int endDay,
                             int endMonth,
                             int endYear,
                             double budget,
                             java.lang.String greenManagerName,
                             java.lang.String greenManagerPhoneNumber,
                             java.lang.String clintManagerName,
                             java.lang.String clientManagerPhoneNumber,
                             int[] stageTime)
        Description: String createProject Method allow to register a project.
        Parameters:
        proyectName - String is the project name.
        clientName - String is the client name.
        startDay - int is the day of the planned start date.
        startMonth - int is the month of the planned start date.
        startYear - int is the year of the planned start date.
        endDay - int is the day of the planned end date.
        endMonth - int is the month of the planned end date.
        endYear - int is the year of the planned end year.
        budget - double is the projects budget.
        greenManagerName - String is the name of the GreenSQA project manager.
        greenManagerPhoneNumber - String is the phone number of the GreenSQA project manager.
        clintManagerName - String is the name if the client project manager.
        clientManagerPhoneNumber - String is the phone number of the GreenSQA project manager.
        stageTime - int is the array that contains the number of months each stage will take.
        Returns:
        bolean true if the project is registered correctly.

      • registerKnowledgeUnit

        public boolean registerKnowledgeUnit(int selectedProject,
                                     int selectedStage,
                                     java.lang.String id,
                                     java.lang.String description,
                                     int type,
                                     java.lang.String collaboratorName,
                                     java.lang.String collaboratorCharge,
                                     java.lang.String learnedLessons)
        Description: The registerKnowledgeUnit method will allow to register a knowledge unit with all its attributes.
        Parameters:
        selectedProject - int is the project position in the project array.
        selectedStage - int is the stage position in the stage array.
        id - String is the knowledge unit identification.
        description - String is a short description of the knowledge unit.
        type - String is the knowledge units type (thecnical or experiences).
        collaboratorName - String is the collaborator name.
        collaboratorCharge - String is the collaborator charge.
        learnedLessons - String is the learned lesson.
        Returns:
        true boolean.

      • approveKnowledgeUnit

        public boolean approveKnowledgeUnit(int projectSelected,
                                    int stageSelected,
                                    int knowledgeUnitSelected,
                                    int approvalElection)
        Description: boolean approveKnowledgeUnit allows to register the knowlegde unit approval.
        Parameters:
        projectSelected - int is the project position in the projects array.
        stageSelected - int is the stage position in the stages array.
        knowledgeUnitSelected - int id the knoeledge unit position int the units array.
        approvalElection - int is the seleccion between approved or disapproved.
        Returns:
        bolean true if the methos was correctly executated.

        stageSelected - int is the stage position in the stages array.
        knowledgeUnitSelected - int id the knoeledge unit position int the units array.

        true.
